verses.text: God of my life, whose gracious power Through varied deaths my soul has led, Or turned aside death's threatening hour, Or lifted up my sinking head;
In all my ways thy hand I own, Thy ruling providence I see; Assist me still my course to run, And still direct my paths to thee.
Thy love for me, the love I owe Returns with interest to thy throne; Ten thousand precious gifts bestow, Here love divine and love are one.
Through every period of my life Thy goodness I'll pursue; And after death in distant worlds, The pleasing theme renew.
